Studies show over 60% of people face sleep-related issues, and understanding this is key to improving your health and well-being.

Did you know, ${userName}, that degraded soils, processed food, and consumption of hormone-treated meats profoundly alter natural sleep cycles? These factors compromise cellular regeneration and the production of essential sleep hormones, causing disturbances that affect body and mind.
